New Records: Christian Eriksen won his 133rd cap, a record for a male Danish player
Key Match Events: Eriksen's shot was saved by Predrag Rajkovic
Joachim Andersen's own goal was disallowed for offside
Denmark had two consecutive corners but couldn't score
Serbia's attack resulted in a shanked shot into their own net
Mitrovic attempted a penalty but was booked for his complaint
Pre-Game Insights: The match was notable for a strange pre-match flag waving incident
Serbia's coach Dragan Stojkovic dropped several key players
Post-Match Reflections: Denmark's coach Kasper Hjulmand expressed optimism for future matches against big nations
Serbia's performance was criticized as tame and unimpressive
Miscellaneous Highlights: A pitch invader interrupted the match
The game was described as 'wholly unsatisfactory'
